node.excerpt: As they were showing the backstory of Steve Kerr I was like… Not interested. But it cracked me up on when, right after winning the NBA final…
How good can this guy get? He goes to play baseball for 21 months and he’s able to come back and win the NBA Final next year.  Glad to see…
Poor Seri-kun, must be hard to have such high maintenance friends. The kiss scene when he’s unconscious was quite funny. Equally funny was…

frontmatter.title: Boku no Tonari ni Ankoku Hakaishin ga Imasu 1x5

node.excerpt: Baseball, the whole thing is a little bit surreal. It looks to me he got special treatment to get into Double-A with the White Socks because…
It’s always the same thing with fame. The Jordan gave everything in the court, he was there for the fans, the media… He won titles and…
